section.name: About Housekeeper
section.p: Housekeeper is an application wich supports the management of a household. Currently, it helps keeping track of which items you have on hand (like food or medicaments). You can specify expiry dates and sort your items after them so you always have an overview of what is going to seed soon.

Please see the Requested features tracker for planned features. If you have an idea for an additional feature please don't hesitate to create a new entry to the tracker or post a message to the forums!
